name: The Ruined Keep
description:
My first ever entry to a game jam - GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

(Performance might be affected by going full screen)

Controls: Mouse and Keyboard only:
WASD to move
Space to Melee Attack
1,2,3 to Cast Spells after unlocking them
Left Mouse Button on an enemy corpse to Possess it and unlock their spell(or upgrade it you've already unlocked it)

Credit for the sprite sheets: https://sanderfrenken.github.io/Universal-LPC-Spritesheet-Character-Generator/ License(s): CC-BY-SA 3.0, GPL 3.0. 

Authors: Nila122, Johannes Sjölund (wulax), Stephen Challener (Redshrike), Benjamin K. Smith (BenCreating), Sander Frenken (castelonia), bluecarrot16, Michael Whitlock (bigbeargames), Matthew Krohn (makrohn), Nila122, Rhimlock, William.Thompsonj
